context: Space Billiards! I love it! Question though: Why not put some explosive in the nose to increase its effect?

replies.context: They want an exact measurement of the effect, an explosive would diminish that ability. They know the mass of the satellite, it's direction and it's speed, Making an energy and vector calculation very easy. The variability of an explosive would ruin that
